About the Company: Kamanwala Housing Construction Limited (KHCL) is a real estate development company. The Company is engaged in construction and development of residential flats, commercial premises and industrial galas. The Company implements projects across central and western Mumbai Bandra Kurla Complex, Andheri, Santa Cruz, Malad and Versova. The Companys commercial projects include I.T. Park at Turbhe, Savoy Chambers at Santacruz (west), Mumbai. Its residential projects include Savoy Residency at Santacruz (west), Mumbai. It derives its revenues from construction and development activities.
